name: DuPont Photonics Technologies
overview: DuPont Photonics Technologies, LLC engages in the design and manufacture of integrated optical components and modules for the global telecommunication and data communication networks. It offers products, such as variable optical attenuator array, integrated reconfigurable optical add drop multiplexer module, and switch with power monitoring and automatic channel balancing. DuPont Photonics Technologies also offers products, including variable multiplexer module, and integrated optical switch array with power balancing. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Wilmington, Massachusetts. As of July 31, 2008, DuPont Photonics Technologies, LLC operates as a subsidiary of Enablence Technologies Inc.
